name: Magic Stick
f: Energy Charge (Does not stack), When enemy casts a spell around you (1400), you gain 1 charge. Maximum   10 charges. When you cast the item, you instantly regenerate 15 hp and   15 mana for each charge. This does not trigger off of non-spells or   attack orbs

name: Ghost Scepter
f: +7 Attributes, Ghost Form makes you unable to attack or be attacked, but you take 44%   extra damage from spells. Ghost Form lasts 4 seconds and has a 30 second   cooldown. Ghost Form ends if you become magic immune, and will have no   effect if you are already magic immune.

name: Clarity Potion
f: Regenerates 100 mana over 30 seconds. Clarity Potion will be dispelled when unit attacks/attacked. Contains 1 charge

name: Flask of  Sapphire Water
f: Regenerates targeted friendly unit HP by 400 HP over 10 seconds., Sapphire Water will be dispelled when unit attacks/attacked. Contains 1 charge

name:
Dust of Appearance
2 charge consumable. Does not stack in inventory.
f: Reveal affects enemy units in a 1050 AoE around the caster. Reveal   prevents affected units from becoming invisible for 12 seconds. Lasts 12 seconds. 60 CD

name: Empty Bottle
f: It can store healing water for up to 3 uses (cast on Fountain), each  healing 135 HP and 70 mana over 3 seconds. It can be used to capture magical runes for 2 minutes. No mana cost.

name: Observer Wards
f: Summon an invisible ward to spy upon an area. Does not have true sight. 6 minutes duration. Contains 2 charges.

name: Sentry Wards
f: Summon an invisible ward to spy upon an area. Will reveals enemy's  invisible unit within 950 AoE. Have small AoE natural vision.3 minutes duration. Contains 2 charges

name: Ancient Tango of  Essifation
f: Restores 115 HP over 16 seconds when bearer eat trees. Contains 3 charges

name: Animal Courier
f: Summon a fast unit with 6 items slot and 45 HP.,If die, all the items will be fall to the ground.

name: Scroll of Town  Portal
f:
Teleport hero to a friendly structure.
75 mana cost. 3 seconds cast time. 65 seconds cooldown
